name: Skippy the Bot
description:
Skippy is on an epic quest to unravel his true destiny.

CONTROLS

Keyboard KB+MGamepad Move Left / RightArrow keys WASD Left Stick / DPad Left LegX LMB X, LB, LT (xbox) Right LegC RMBA, RB, RT (xbox) Pause / OptionsEnter Tab Start Look AroundShiftSpaceSelectRestart LevelRR

Air Control - To rotate in the air, hold one of the legs retracted
Flip - Double tap any leg button to do a quick flip, useful to get up on your feet
Switch Color Palette - Pause the game with Enter to access the options menu

This game was made to celebrate AM2R's 5th anniversary, and it's based on a brief sequence where you remotely control a robot. In this puzzle physics platformer, you'll be challenged to complete 10 hand crafted levels. It's a short experience, that makes it very appealing to try speed running, or other challenges:

  • Can you complete the game while collecting all the gems?
  • Can you complete the game without collecting any gems at all?
  • How about a deathless run?

Have fun!

New in v1.15

  • Added LB, LT, RB, RT buttons to gamepad controls
  • Tweaked the last level for better flow
  • Added linux64 build to downloads
